name: MissOfTheDay
tag_list: social-network, fashion, pictures, photo-sharing, social-media, contest, instagram
overview:
MissOfTheDay - Be popular, become a miss. www.missoftheday.com

Missoftheday is a contest-oriented social network where girls import pictures directly from their Instagram profile. All platform users can vote and everyday the picture that gets more ‘likes’ becomes the MissOfTheDay. Then, the winner is posted on the “Wall of fame” that contains all the winning pictures. Everyone on the platform has a public profile (PhotoBook) and other users can vote, comment and share pictures on the most popular social networks. There are special sections where pictures are ordered by votes, visits and comments received. The “Daily Chart” section reports a real-time-updated daily chart. The Gamification System allows users to win more badges and to reach more visibility through gaining specific achievements.
